name: Salvage WIP
description:
Built this game in 48 hours with my brother and my 10 year-old son for DJAM 4.  Unfortunately we did not come close to finishing, but we'll continue to work on it.

OBJECTIVE

Find treasure and sell it for profit. (can't sell yet :(  )

CONTROLS

Move with WASD

Lower/Raise Winch with SPACE.
